Name: DashPanel
About the game: Show fully customizable dashboard displays for your favourite racing sims either on your extra monitor, on screen overlay or in VR. NOTE: Purchasing Steam DLC gives you access to full data on the Windows version of DashPanel ONLY!! If you wish to access full data on Android or iOS devices purchase the full data unlocks within the DashPanel application on the desired platform. ►Powerful editor allows you to modify built in dashboards or build one from the ground up. ►Easily download and share created dashboards online within the app. ►Button box functionality (PC only), use virtual buttons to trigger keystrokes on your PC. Try the time unlimited demo version that reads RPM, Speed and Gear. Full data unlocks can be purchased for each game via the in app store. Supported devices • Main monitor as an overlay on top of the game • USB Monitors that extend the desktop • VR HMD as overlay (SteamVR only) • USBD480 (touch not supported) • VoCore Screen Supported games • American Truck Simulator - ATS • Assetto Corsa (PC/PS4) • Assetto Corsa Competizione - ACC (PC) • Automobilista • Automobilista 2 • BeamNG.drive • DiRT 4 (PC) • DiRT Rally (PC) • DiRT Rally 2.0 (PC) • Euro Truck Simulator 2 - ETS2 • F1 2012 - 16 (PC) • F1 2017 • F1 2018 • F1 2019 • F1 2020 • F1 2021 • F1 2022 • Forza Horizon 4/5 • Forza Motorsport 7 • GRID 2019 (PC) • Grid Autosport • iRacing • KartKraft • Live For Speed - LFS • Project Cars - pCars • Project Cars 2 - pCars2 • RaceRoom Racing Experience - R3E • RBR NGP 6 • rFactor • rFactor 2 Supported widgets vary depending on data provided by each game. You can review widget compatibility in app. For more details visit: DashPanel is not official software and is provided 'as is' and 'with all faults'. All trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners. All names are used for identification purposes only. DashPanel uses Unity Analytics To read the privacy policy see the section “I play a game that uses Unity Analytics, what do I need to know?” at the following URL: -policy
